GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v6.1.7
GSD.description:
iommu/iova: Fix alloc iova overflows issue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.7 by commit 61cbf790e7329ed78877560be7136f0b911bba7f, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 4e89dce725213d3d0b0475211b500eda4ef4bf2f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: iommu/iova: Fix alloc iova overflows issue
